resources.string: We\'ll send you an email with your registration for future use.
Check here to receive news from CBI about upcoming events and more!
I have read and understand the above statement.
Your ticket will print below. Grab it and have a great time on the water!
CBIDeviceAdmin must be the device owner to enable COSU functionality for the CBI kiosk! Consult with an IT member if you are seeing this message.
Allows the CBI kiosk app to perform COSU functions.
Allow CBI kiosk app to administrate this device. Required to allow the COSU policies for this kiosk to be established.

Fun and easy way to enjoy time on the water with gorgeous views of Boston’s Back Bay

Kayaks and Stand Up Paddleboards

Paddling is limited to the basin between the Mass Ave. bridge and the Longfellow bridge.

Lifejackets are provided and MUST be worn at all times

Available options accomodate 1-2 people

Your group leader must have sailing experience to rent a sailboat.

16 and 19 foot keeled dinghy sailboats

Sailing is limited to the basin between the Mass Ave. bridge and the Longfellow bridge.

Lifejackets are provided and MUST be worn at all times

Available options accomodate 1-5 people

Daily flat rate of $45 - No hourly rate

Due back 1/2 hour before sunset.

Rental valid all day - come and go as you please

Seats 1-2
\nYou must return your rental 1/2 hour before sunset.

Daily flat rate of $45 - No hourly rate

Due back 1/2 hour before sunset.

Rental valid all day - come and go as you please

Seats 1-2
\nYou must return your rental 1/2 hour before sunset.

16 foot keeled dinghy

Due back at sunset

Seats 1-4
\nYou must have sailing experience to rent.

19 foot keeled daysailer

Due back 1/2 hour before sunset.

Seats 2-5
\nYou must have sailing experience to rent.
Experience Boston from the scenic Charles River. Rentals are a daily flat rate so you can come and go as you please. Options for everyone, even if you’ve never been on the water before!

To go out sailing with a member you must be registered as a guest. We do this for your safety, so we can account for everyone, on every boat, every time.
If you have already registered as a guest online or on a previous visit you can print out the confirmation email and skip the kiosk, or click returning guest on the next page.
